import React ,{useState}from 'react'; import SubMenu from './SubMenu'; function menuShow(menu){ if(menu==="BRAND" || menu==="MENU" || menu==="EVENT" || menu==="ORDER"){ return "on" }else{ return "off" } } const Header = () => { const [menu, setMenu] = useState() const [event,setEvent] = useState() const UiMouseOver = () => { setMenu(menu) }; const UiMouseOut = () => { event.target.dataset.state = "closed"; event.target.ariaExpanded= false; setMenu('No') }; const handleMouseOver = (e) => { e.target.dataset.state = "open"; e.target.ariaExpanded= true; setMenu(e.target.innerHTML) setEvent(e) if(menuShow(menu)=="on"){ } }; const handleMouseOut = (e) => { event.target.dataset.state = "closed"; event.target.ariaExpanded= false; setMenu('No') if(menuShow(menu)=="on"){ } }; return ( <>
